form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application for Permanent Residence, I-485 ( (Rev. 06-23-86) Y

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/22/2023 U.S. Department of Justice OMB # 1115-0053 Immigration and Naturalization Service (INS) Application for Permanent Residence DO NOT WRITE IN THIS BLOCK Case ID# Action PROVED Fee Stamp LN.S DISTRICT DIRECTOR A# 28708181 G-28 or Volag# JUL 21 1987 909457 Section of Law M. Kolland Eligibility Under Sec. 245 Sec. 209(b), INA Recom Approved Visa Petition 2879 Sec. 214(d), INA Dependent of Principal Alien Sec. 13, Act of 9/11/57 Special Immigrant Sec. 245, INA Other Sec. 249, INA Country Chargeable Preference A. Reason for this application I am applying for lawful permanent residence for the following reason: (check the box that applies) 1. An immigrant visa number is immediately available to me because A visa petition has already been approved for me (approval notice is attached) A visa petition is being filed with this application 2. I entered as the fiance(e) of a U.S. citizen and married within 90 days (approval notice and marriage certificate are attached) 3. I am an asylee eligible for adjustment 4. Other: B. Information about you 1. Name (Family name in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 11. On what date did you last enter the U.S.? BAKSHI, Sheila 1/12/84 2. Address (Number and Street) (Apartment Number) 12. Where did you last enter the U.S.? (City and State) 221 East Bayan Street Los Angeles, California (Town or City) (State/Country) (ZIP/Postal Code) 13. What means of travel did you use? (Plane, car, etc.) Ontario, California 91761 Plane 3. Place of Birth (Town or City) (State/Country) 14. Were you inspected by a U.S. immigration officer? Lahore, India (Now Pakistan) Yes No 4. Date of Birth 5. Sex 6. Marital Status 15. In what status did you last enter the U.S.? (Mo/Day/Yr) (Visitor, student, exchange alien, crewman, temporary worker, Male Married Single without inspection, etc.) 5/7/15 Female Widowed Divorced B-2 7. Social Security Number 8. Alien Registration Number (if any) 16. Give your name EXACTLY as it appears on your Arrival/Departure Record (Form I-94). 9. Country of Citizenship Sheila Bakshi 17. Arrival/Departure Record (1-94) Number 18. Visa Number India 10. Have you ever applied for permanent resident status in the U.S.? Yes X No 4 1 9 8 1 8 0 002462 (If Yes, give the date and place of filing and final disposition) 19. At what Consulate was your nonimmigrant visa issued? Date (Mo/Day/Yr) New Delhi, India 1/4/84 20. Have you ever been married before? Yes No If Yes, (Names of prior husbands/wives) (Country of citizenship) (Date marriage ended) Bihari Lal Bakshi India Deceased 6/25/67 21. Has your husband/wife ever been married before? Yes No EMPLOYMENT AUTHORIZE If Yes, (Names of prior husbands/wives) (Country of citizenship) (Date marriage ended) N/A DATE: LOS CR AC SIGNATURE IE DO INITIAL RECEIPT RESUBMITTED RELOCATED MPLETED Rec'd Sent Approved Denied Returned Form I-485 (Rev. 06-23-86) Y
